sentence: Any of the Federal workers who  are forced to work because they are in our military, they are in  Federal law enforcement, they are TSA, or they are air traffic  controllers--they are keeping this Nation and Americans safe--if we are  going to force them to work, at a minimum, let's make sure we pay them  and pay them on time.
